body_html:
I will make another big commit for Thursday. Thanks for your patience :)

The current architecture is dependent on the output projection wrapper. If we remove it, we need to reinstate the output_fn.

The value comparison for the test case is a little complicated as we don't know the embeddings chosen by the random initialized decoder under inference. But maybe if we switch the order and do inference first. I will try it out.

body:
I will make another big commit for Thursday. Thanks for your patience :)

The current architecture is dependent on the output projection wrapper. If we remove it, we need to reinstate the output_fn.

The value comparison for the test case is a little complicated as we don't know the embeddings chosen by the random initialized decoder under inference. But maybe if we switch the order and do inference first. I will try it out.
